issue.title: Cache updated when updating config/policy
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

To reflect directly changes inside existing config and policy definition, EasySDI should be able to remove or update GetCapabilities cache concerned by cupdated onfig/policy definitions.


**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

As policies are now saved inside Joomla database and not anymore through files, cancelling PROXY cache have been implemented.
All caches are automatically cancelled by easySDI in regard of modifications applied to user accounts, physical service, virtual services and naturally policy rules...

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Such issue haven't been beforehand voted but is a natural behaviour with new policy storage type (database instead of files)...
